name: Who is these artworks for?
description:
This is a first game I made while studying Unity as a hobby. 

That much the quality is poor so I made it whatever came to mind.

This game is worth one cent. I tried to buy a glorious KitKat with the money I earned from the game for the first time by receiving donations one by one

However, the donation was not received on a cent basis. 

That's very disappointing, itch.io.
